screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .vss file in The Omni Group OmniGraffle 7
screenshot.caption: VSS file open in The Omni Group OmniGraffle 7

description: Microsoft Visio is primarily utilized in business settings to create workflow diagrams, organizational charts, business flowcharts, database models, and software and network diagrams. Visio comes with VSS files pre-installed, and users may create them, as well.

The VSS format was more common in the 2000s when Visio saved stencils as VSS files by default. However, Microsoft replaced VSS files ( binary-based ) with the .VSSX format ( Zip-based ) when it released Visio 2013. Visio 2013 and later versions still support VSS files.

images.caption: VSS file open in The Omni Group OmniGraffle 7
